brb.description: Let the Community know you're not around, for some time.

duration_option.description: For how long will you be away?

back.description: Let the Community know you're back.

cooldown.title: Out of service!
cooldown.description:
I might've ran out of batteries or slipped over a banana peel.
Let me recharge for **~{wait}** and then try again.

unknown_exception.title: Out of service!
unknown_exception.description:
I might've hit a brick wall or something isn't computing properly.
Could you try this again?

If it happens again, I might need to call in the manager...

completed_successfully.title: You're set up and ready to go!
completed_successfully.description: The wicked machinery has been enabled for this Community.

previously_completed.title: You're already set!
previously_completed.description:
The wicked machinery has already been enabled for this Community.
You don't have to do anything else.

not_configured.title: I'm not configured, yet
not_configured.description: Looks like I have not yet been enabled for this Community.

setup.upgrade_footer: Need more? Upgrade your plan on the Dashboard.

user_gone.title: Missing for a bit
user_gone.description: {isInboxCreated, select, true {{user} will be gone for **~{duration}**, but they'll have their inbox open.} other {{user} will be gone for **~{duration}**.}}
